specialAbilities.Swarm: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny snake. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

Bites (swarm has more than half HP).target: one creature in the swarm's space
Bites (swarm has more than half HP).onHit: (2d6) piercing damage. The target must make a DC 10 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one
